title: What a fuckin joke!
selftext: Manipur police is so swift at arresting any random person who makes a comment against the CM or government on social media even if they are residing outside the state ( yes I know because I have friends who are constantly targeted for their social media posts) but they could not find the rapists even after 2 months.Some faces are clearly seen in the video and the location of the incident is also known.And they have only spoken up after the video got viral today.What a joke! This is sickening!
comments:
A case of two identity. Both murdered by Meitei miscreants. One of them is a Kuki. Another a Naga.  
Different treatment from Manipur Goverment and Manipur Police.  


https://preview.redd.it/bdw9dnc7f0db1.jpeg?width=1079&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=75ed2838312bcd928eccf79b56e5d3fb2fdc02d5
They are just implementing the guju model
